title: Tech giants are spending big on AI in a bid to dominate the boom
description: Earnings reports from Meta, Alphabet and Microsoft reaffirm that giants are ramping up their spending on artificial intelligence, as they rush to reap the benefits of an AI boom.
content:
The titans of the technology sector are ramping up their spending on artificial intelligence, as they rush to reap the benefits of an AI boom that has pushed stocks to record highs.

title: Mixed share reaction to megacap earnings burst, Meta droops
description: Shares in three of the "Magnificent Seven" companies with significant investments in artificial intelligence were mixed in after-hours trade on Wednesday after the mega caps released third quarter earnings.
content:

title: Tata research centres join hands to develop AI learning hub in Bengaluru
description: The National Centre for Biological Sciences (NCBS) and the International Centre for Theoretical Sciences (ICTS), both centres of the Tata Institute of Fundamental Research (TIFR), have signed an agreement to jointly establish the Centre for Artificial Learning and Intelligence for Biological Research and Education (CALIBRE) in Bengaluru.

title: Microsoft takes $3.1 billion hit from OpenAI investment
description: Microsoft and OpenAI are key partners in cloud and artificial intelligence, but they're increasingly becoming competitors as well.
content:
Microsoft took a $3.1 billion hit to its net income in the first quarter due to the software company's hefty investment in OpenAI.

description: Businesses are increasingly relying on artificial intelligence to streamline operations, enhance decision-making, and improve efficiency.
content:

title: AI chipmaker Nvidia becomes first $5 trillion company
description: Nvidia has become the first $5 trillion company, just three months after the Silicon Valley chipmaker was first to break through the $4 trillion barrier.
